short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces images on websites with images of Alan Partridge

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces images on websites with photos of Alan Partridge. This does not work on lazy loaded images or background images, so is being used as a visual aid while working on implementing lazy loading for a company website. Can also be used to wind up/prank friends and family.
